name: Protein-Packed Zucchini Bread
instructions: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
In a large bowl, mix together the whole wheat flour, vanilla protein powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and then add the Greek yogurt, olive oil, honey, grated zucchini, and vanilla extract. Mix well.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
description: A moist and delicious zucchini bread packed with protein to support your fitness goals. Perfect for a post-workout snack or a healthy treat.
additional_notes: Store the zucchini bread in an airtight container for up to 5 days, or freeze individual slices for a quick grab-and-go option. You can also add nuts or chocolate chips for extra flavor and texture.
